p: The adverse effects of drugs and synthetic antioxidants have drawn the attention of researchers to explore new sources of natural antioxidants and hepatoprotectants which are more potent to control oxidative stress and avert the initiation of disease propagation [ 37, 38]. Antioxidants are those compounds that inhibit the oxidation of critical biomolecules by preventing the propagation of oxidizing chain reactions [ 39]. Interestingly, few studies on the antioxidant properties of Tb fruit have been done earlier [ 13, 19, 40]. However, this is the first study that assessed the antioxidant, anti-inflammatory and hepatoprotective attributes of Tb fruit aqueous and ethyl acetate extracts and EA against DCF induced liver injury in albino Wistar rats.
